name: Bomb Squad (Magn)
description:
Bring the bomb to the exit stairs. Don't blow up the baby. Try to go deeper. Control player 1 with arrow buttons and player 2 with WASD.  Reset game with SPACE-key.

Good luck!

Technical background

This is a basic multiplayer demo made with Phaser, Gimp and Garage Band. A tutorial by Michael Hadley was very helpful:

https://medium.com/@michaelwesthadley/modular-game-worlds-in-phaser-3-tilemaps-3...

Credits

Graphics - Spritesheets by Michele "Buch" Bucelli (artist) and Abram Connelly (assets sponsor).  Bomb from Rawpixel.

https://opengameart.org/users/buch
https://www.rawpixel.com/image/6287121/png-public-domain-black

Sound - Music by Magnus Lindh.

https://soundcloud.com/magnus-lindh-95702282/bomb-squad-2022-08-06-1858
